CreateWikiAIThreshold.description: Integer or false. Minimum percentage point threshold for a request to be automatically created when acceptable.

CreateWikiAutoApprovalFilter.description: Array. Regexes in request descriptions to never auto approve if matched.

CreateWikiCacheDirectory.description: String. The path to store CreateWiki cache files at.

CreateWikiCacheType.description: String or false. Key from $wgObjectCaches to use for CreateWiki cache. If false, defaults to $wgMainCacheType.

CreateWikiCannedResponses.description: Array. An array of default responses to give. If this is enabled (not an empty array), free-text options are removed.

CreateWikiCategories.description: Array. An array of categories used for wiki categorization. If this is an empty array, categories will not be used at all.

CreateWikiCollation.description: String. Sets the collation to use when creating the wiki database. Example is 'DEFAULT SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci'

CreateWikiContainers.description: Array. List of local containers to create. Format: <container>: <public/public-private/private>. public means directory will always be public. public-private is to support public/private and uses isPrivate check. private means directory is private regardless of wiki status. Defaults to MW default containers with most public apart from deleted and temp.

CreateWikiCustomDomainPage.description: String. Page name to link to for more information on custom domains.

CreateWikiDatabase.description: String. Database name of where cw_wikis is stored.

CreateWikiDatabaseClusters.description: Array. LBFactory clusters which CreateWiki considers active.

CreateWikiDatabaseClustersInactive.description: Array. LBFactory clusters which are not considered active for use of automatic loadbalancing.

CreateWikiDisableRESTAPI.description: Boolean. If set to true, disable the REST API

CreateWikiDisallowedSubdomains.description: Array or string. Regexes to match for disallowed subdomains.

CreateWikiEmailNotifications.description: Boolean. Whether to send emails for new wiki creations.

CreateWikiEnableManageInactiveWikis.description: Boolean. Should the manageInactiveWikis.php maintenance script be enabled? That script marks wikis as inactive, closed, or deleted per $wgCreateWikiStateDays.

CreateWikiGlobalWiki.description: String. Database name of the global wiki. This should be the wiki where the special pages should be enabled.

CreateWikiInactiveExemptReasonOptions.description: Array. Possible options for marking a wiki as exempt from inactivity.

CreateWikiNotificationEmail.description: String. Email address to send internally generated notification emails to. Does not depend on $wgCreateWikiEmailNotifications.

CreateWikiPersistentModelFile.description: String. Location to a file that can be overwritten to contain a persistent machine learning model.

CreateWikiPurposes.description: Array. List of identified purposes to show when requesting a wiki.

CreateWikiShowBiographicalOption.description: Boolean. Whether to show a biographical person option when requesting a wiki.

CreateWikiSQLfiles.description: Array. All SQLs to be loaded into every wiki by default.

CreateWikiStateDays.description: Array. Integer values in days when a wiki is deemed inactive, closed, removed (hidden) and deleted. Number of days passed since last change - not from initial inactivity.

CreateWikiSubdomain.description: String. The master part of subdomains, e.g. wiki.example.com, example.com is the master part.

CreateWikiUseClosedWikis.description: Boolean. Whether to implement front end logic for closing wikis.

CreateWikiUseCustomDomains.description: Boolean. Whether to implement front end logic to handle requesting custom domains for wikis in RequestWiki.

CreateWikiUseEchoNotifications.description: Boolean. Whether to use Echo notifications (beta feature).

CreateWikiUseExperimental.description: Boolean. Whether to implement front-end logic for marking wikis as experimental.

CreateWikiUseInactiveWikis.description: Boolean. Whether to implement front end logic for inactive wikis.

CreateWikiUseJobQueue.description: Boolean. Whether to defer intensive tasks to the jobqueue.

CreateWikiUsePrivateWikis.description: Boolean. Whether to implement front end logic for marking wikis as private.

RequestWiki.description: Boolean. Whether RequestWiki should be enabled or not.

RequestWikiConfirmAgreement.description: Boolean. Require users to confirm they will abide by farm policies.

RequestWikiConfirmEmail.description: Boolean. Require users to confirm emails before being able to request wikis.

RequestWikiMinimumLength.description: Integer. Minimum length for descriptions within wiki requests.

RequestWikiUseDescriptions.description: Boolean. Whether to allow adding WikiDiscover descriptions from RequestWiki or not. If WikiDiscover is not installed, this does nothing.
